div.p: Welcome to the THE GATEWAY TO EXTRAORDINARY POSSIBILITIES. Our mission is to challenge and support each student to develop effective critical thinking, problem solving, and communication skills as a life-long learner acting in an ethical manner to serve a broader community through a community of learners.
Learn about our annual goals and how they underscore local and statewide priorities.
Providing the safest and most reliable means of transportation for our students, staff, and community.
Providing safe school environments that protect students from physical and emotional harm.
